terminology.description: Canonical terms and their definitions for this project

terms.ADWS: AI Developer Workflow System - autonomous development workflow orchestration
terms.ADW ID: 8-character hexadecimal identifier for individual workflow instances
terms.Isolated Workflow Pattern: Architecture where each workflow gets dedicated worktree, ports, and state file
terms.SDLC Phase: Software Development Lifecycle phase (Plan, Build, Test, Review, Document, Ship)
terms.ZTE: Zero-Touch Execution - fully automated workflow from issue to merged PR
terms.TUI: Terminal User Interface - interactive dashboard using Textual framework
terms.Worktree: Isolated git working directory created for each workflow
terms.State File: JSON file at agents/{adw_id}/adw_state.json tracking workflow progress
terms.LLM Adapter: Protocol implementation for different AI providers (Anthropic, OpenAI, Gemini)
terms.Quality Gate: Automated checkpoint validating document quality before proceeding
terms.Protocol ellipsis: Valid Python syntax using '...' in Protocol/ABC abstract method bodies (PEP 544)

field_naming.identifiers: adw_id for workflow identifier, issue_number for GitHub issue

file_naming.design_docs: NN_{title}.md with leading number for ordering

project_context.project_description: Zero-touch execution framework for autonomous AI-native development workflows
project_context.framework: Pydantic for data validation, Textual for TUI, Claude Code for LLM integration

forbidden_terms.description: Terms that should never be used in this project's documentation
